issue.title: [C++][Compute] Improve sorting and topn benchmarks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10401](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10401). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fix some issues of sorting(sort_indices) and topn(partition_nth_indices) kernel benchmarks:
- For 1M and 8M array size, only 100% null case is tested. It's not useful.
- Missing benchmark for floating point types.
